thread.title: TV | American Gangster

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | American Gangster
text: This Saturday night movie features the talented Mr Denzel Washington, who really can't do too much wrong in the movie world and this is no exception. He plays 1970s drug kingpin Frank Lucas, who was a great man for the heroin smuggling back in the day in the New York underworld. Josh Brolin plays the detective that must bring his empire down, but it proves difficult enough to do with police corruption around every corner. Ahh the seventies in New York... sounds like great craic altogether.
